metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1386 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in unshield 1.0-1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunshield0 - 1.4.2-1
unshield - 1.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unshield package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-1').
